entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 18. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
